text:
Oh, Producer-san.
Um… Is the training camp camera having some issues?

…? Just earlier, the practice seemed fulfilling,
and I thought Yuika was enjoying taking pictures.

Yeah, I'm enjoying it!
But… It's just that—

I'm worried that due to my lack of skill,
I might not be able to bring out the best in the subjects…

Huh?
Isn't that worrying too much…?

Not at all! I mean, we're supposed to make something
worth watching! Something that all the fans will see!

I want to make videos that are as impressive as
possible! I want to capture everyone's best moments!

Maybe I should just cause some trouble
and have them face it head-on…?

Hey, hey, hey!
Faking it would be the most disappointing thing!

Aww, I know that!
I'm just looking for some natural drama!

...But seriously,
I don't think you need to worry that much.

Everyone you're filming seems very natural.
If I were a fan, I'd want to see them like that.

If you just keep shooting as usual,
I think we can make something great…

W-Wow…
To hear such straightforward encouragement at this point…

…Well, if you put it that way, then I guess it's okay.
I'll believe in you, P-tan!
